about_the_game:
In Croquettes Gang, you play as Sneak & Snack, two pets whose goal is to steal as many kibbles as possible from your master's apartment to resell them to the local mouse gang, with a view to buying the legendary Golden Croquette.
But the task will not be as easy as it seems! During the night your master is struck by a chaotic sleepwalking attack which will often endanger the plans of our two little animals.
Your role: Steal as many kibbles as possible before the end of the night, while doing everything in your power to protect your master's sleep. Because if he wakes up, he will confiscate part of your loot from the night.

In this online cooperative party game, you will have to organize with your partner to collect the most loot at night while monitoring the sleepwalkers' dreams which can impact the environment. Fire, floods, storms, you will have to manage these changes and many others by moving objects and making them interact together.
Between each night, you will have the opportunity to spend your hard-earned kibble to obtain bonuses or unlock new rooms.

Gang de Croquette was developed as part of the Ubisoft 2024 university competition and received 4 nominations (Best Art Direction, Technical Award, Theme Integration and Jury Prize)
